definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate

sentences.english: Ginger has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and can slow cancer growth. Turmeric, the spice that forms the base of most curries, is from a root in the ginger family.
sentences.chinese: 姜具有强大的抗炎功能，能减缓肿瘤的生长。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heaily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中纬度地区大力提倡植树造林以减缓气候变化。

sentences.english: These acids give the fruits tartness and slow down bacterial spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 这些酸把水果并减缓细菌酸的性质。

sentences.english: It slows thought, and dulls memory.
sentences.chinese: 这一切减缓了我的思考，模糊了我的记忆。

sentences.english: This slows down or even prevents the development of generic and new vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 这减缓甚至阻止了仿制疫苗和新疫苗的开发。

sentences.english: Foam can retard gas channeling and gravity override in gas flooding.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫剂可以减缓气驱中的气窜和重力超覆现象。

sentences.english: It also confirms the notion that planting more trees in tropical rainforests could help slow global warming worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 而在热带雨林种更多的树则会减缓全球变暖。

sentences.english: The PEG slowed down the decreasing of blende…
sentences.chinese: PEG的引入能减缓共混纤维力学性能的下降。

sentences.english: Conclusions Progressive addition lenses can be used to slow down myopia development effectively in teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 结论渐进多焦镜能有效减缓青少年近视的发展。

sentences.english: The H2S corrosion to cement stone can be controlled effectively through reducing the ratio of calcium to silicon.
sentences.chinese: 降低水泥石的渗透率有利于减缓H2S腐蚀速度。

sentences.english: On the international level, the most pressing issue is mitigation of climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在国际层面，最紧迫的问题是减缓气候变化的影响。

sentences.english: It speeds up and it slows down and it wobbles as it rotates.
sentences.chinese: 它时而加速时而减缓，并且当它转动时总是在摇摆。

sentences.english: A chemical substance that prevents or slows a cathodic or reduction reaction.
sentences.chinese: 一种阻止或减缓阴极反应的化学物质。

sentences.english: An excellent antioxidant, may slow oil decay rate, extended oil change period.
sentences.chinese: 优良的抗氧性，可减缓油品衰变速度，延长换油期。

sentences.english: Although the frequency of acquisitions has slowed, their number remains high.
sentences.chinese: 尽管收购的频率已经减缓，数目却维持在高峰。

sentences.english: The class divisions will deepen further as growth inevitably slows.
sentences.chinese: 阶级矛盾的不断加深将不可避免的减缓增长。

definition: to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
